page.title: 06A CHESTERTON SCHOOLBOY
page.content: On Mondays I get up at 7 o'clock to get ready for school.Mum makes my breakfast.After breakfast I have a wash and leave for school.I take a packed lunch to school.At 8.30 I call for a friend.We walk to school together.At 9.30,after Assembly,we have lessons.We do Maths for an hour. We have a quarter of an hour break. After break we go back to English lessons for another hour.At 12 o'clock we have dinner break.More lessons, History & Reading from 2.30 to 3.30 when the bell rings for home.When I get home I go out to play until 5pm. That is teatime.I'm not allowed to go out to play after ten.At 7pm I have a Judo lesson at St.Lawrence Hall until 8.30pm.When I get home from Judo I stay up until 11pm.This is when I go to bed.
